attributes.action: make longer sentences/more strict punishments for animal cruelty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel it is about time animal abusers were given longer sentences or more strict punishments for the abuse they inflict.

Violence inflicted on ANY LIVING CREATURE is inhumane and cruel, and the offenders should be punished in reflection to that.

It is NOT acceptable for someone to use a dog as a football, throw a cat against a wall etc and receive minor punishments such as community service or a 5 year ban from keeping animals.

People should be made aware of the seriousness of the problem at hand, and do something about it.
